blogPost.title: How can women in particular overcome impostor syndrome in tech? Answer by Grace Chen, CEO and Co-founder @commonnet. https://t.co/HG2194sEe5 https://t.co/X0NCGMGkl3
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 尤其是女性如何克服科技界的冒牌货综合症？由CEO兼联合创始人@commonnet的Grace Chen回答。https://t.co/HG2194sEe5 https://t.co/X0NCGMGkl3。
尤其是女性如何克服科技界的冒牌貨綜合症？由CEO兼聯合創始人@commonnet的Grace Chen回答。https://t.co/HG2194sEe5 https://t.co/X0NCGMGkl3。
特に女性は、技術分野での偽者症候群をどのように克服すればよいのでしょうか？回答：Grace Chen, CEO and Co-founder @commonnet. https://t.co/HG2194sEe5 https://t.co/X0NCGMGkl3

previous.title: How can you keep your kids from doing inappropriate things online during the school day? Answer by @RonnaGlickman, Speaker, Educator, Consultant. https://t.co/jdd79R1Dtu https://t.co/aovPguozCn

localize.full_text: 如何让孩子在上学期间不在网上做不正当的事情？回答者：@RonnaGlickman，演讲者、教育家、顾问。https://t.co/jdd79R1Dtu https://t.co/aovPguozCn。
如何讓孩子在上學期間不在網上做不正當的事情？回答者：@RonnaGlickman，演講者、教育家、顧問。https://t.co/jdd79R1Dtu https://t.co/aovPguozCn。
学校の授業中に子供がネットで不適切なことをしないようにするにはどうしたらいいでしょうか？Answer by @RonnaGlickman, Speaker, Educator, Consultant. https://t.co/jdd79R1Dtu https://t.co/aovPguozCn

next.title: How can we reframe difficult situations to help get us through tough times? Answer by @AneseCavanaugh, author of Contagious You. https://t.co/2AVNOQa8Tn https://t.co/3DGwUKPVyQ

localize.full_text: 我们如何重构困难的局面，帮助我们度过困难时期？由《传染的你》的作者@AneseCavanaugh回答。https://t.co/2AVNOQa8Tn https://t.co/3DGwUKPVyQ。
我們如何重構困難的局面，幫助我們度過困難時期？由《傳染的你》的作者@AneseCavanaugh回答。https://t.co/2AVNOQa8Tn https://t.co/3DGwUKPVyQ。
困難な状況を乗り越えるために、どのようにリフレーミングすればよいのでしょうか？Contagious You』の著者、@AneseCavanaugh氏の回答です。https://t.co/2AVNOQa8Tn https://t.co/3DGwUKPVyQ
